Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: ahasa matada, aḷuyam tārakāva matada, sattakinma
(nabiyē!) aḷuyam tārakāva kimekdæyi oba dannehida
(eya) giṇi dæl vihiduvana tārakāvaki
sǣma miniseku vetama (apa visin æti karana lada) avadhānaya kaḷa hæki keneku nættē novē
ebævin minisā (taman) kumak nisā utpādanaya karanu læba ættēdæyi poḍiyak avadhānaya kara bæliya yutuya
(ǣtaṭa) panimin ikut vana ek jala bin̆dak maginma utpādanaya karanu læbuvēya
eya kon̆du æṭavalaṭada, iḷa æṭavalaṭada madhyayen ikut vannēya
(mesē utpādanaya karanu labana) ohu, (mohu maraṇayaṭa pat vū pasu mohuṭa paṇa dī) nævata paṇa gænvīmaṭada, niyata vaśayenma ohu balasampannayeki
kumana dinakadī siyalū gupta dæyada eḷidarav vī yannēda
(edinadī) minisāṭa kisima śaktiyak ættē næta. udav karannanda ættē næta
varṣāva vasinā ahasa matada
(pæḷǣṭi, gasvæl ādiya væḍennaṭa) pupuraṇa bhūmiya matada
sattakinma! ættenma meya (pin pav deka) venkara dænviya hæki poronduvaki
meya puhu samaccal (vadanak) nova
(nabiyē!) niyata vaśayenma ovun (obaṭa viruddhava) kumantraṇayak karannāha
mamada (ovunṭa viruddhava) kumantraṇayak karannemi
ebævin mema pratikṣēpa karannanṭa (etek) oba avakāśayak labā denu. (adhika vaśayen nova). itāmat suḷu avakāśayak labā denu
(nabiyē!) itāmat śrēṣṭha oba deviyangē śuddha vū nāmaya oba praśaṁsā kara suviśuddha karanu mænava
ohuma (siyalū utpādanayanma) utpādanaya kara (ēvā niyamita andamaṭa) sælasum kaḷa ayayi
ohuva (ēvāṭa avaśya siyalū dæya) manakkalpita kara (ēvā læbiya hæki) mārgayanda (ēvāṭa) dænum dunnēya
ohuma (gamē satunṭa) ulǣ kǣmaṭa avaśya dæyada ikut karannēya
pasuva ēvā viyaḷī giya paṅaræl bavaṭa pat karannēya
(nabiyē! mema kurānaya) api obaṭa samudīraṇaya kirīmaṭa uganvannemu. allāh adahas kaḷahot misa, (ehi kisima dæyak) oba amataka karannē næta
niyata vaśayenma ohu sæn̆gavī æti dæyada, piṭata penumaṭa æti dæyada hon̆din dannēya
pahasu vū (dharmaya) api obaṭa pahasu kara labā dennemu
ebævin hon̆da ovadan (janayāṭa) prayōjanavat vana turu oba dēśanā karaminma siṭinu
niyata vaśayenma kavurun (allāhṭa) biya vannēda, ohu (memagin) hon̆da dænumak at kara gannēya
abhāgyavantayā nam, meyin ǣt vī yannēya
(ehet) ohu (nirayē) imahat ginna at kara gannēya
pasuva ehi ohu maraṇayaṭa pat vannēda næta. (sæpasē) jīvat vannēda næta
kavurun (pāpayangen ǣt vī) pariśuddhavantayeku vannēda, ohu niyata vaśayenma jayagrahaṇaya kaḷēya
ohu tama deviyangē śuddha vū nāmaya suviśuddha karaminda, namadiminda siṭinnēya
